BC Reference Model Version 1.0.0
cimi.context

Element ObservationContext

Documentation:

Context for recording an evaluation result, used to indicate an evaluation has been made.

Ancestors:
  • Locatable
    • NonIndependent
      • StatementContext
        • FindingContext
          • RecordedContext
            • ObservationContext

    • Field Summary

      Properties Defined Constraints Value
      ResultValue

      The finding itself, such as the blood pressure value recorded.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      ResultValue
      0..1
      ExceptionValue

      Reason that a value associated with a test or other finding is missing.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Value Set
      ExceptionValue
      0..1
      http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/data-absent-reason (EXTENSIBLE)
      DeltaFlag

      Indicator of significant change (delta) from the last or previous measurement.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      DeltaFlag
      0..1
      Issued

      The date and time this observation was made available to providers, typically after the results have been reviewed and verified.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Issued
      0..1
      Observer

      The person or organization who observed or informed the reporter about the characteristic, potentially the clinician, the patient, or a related person.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Observer
      0..*
